name: diya-sdk
description: SDK for accessing Diya One services

scripts.build-min: browserify src/diya-sdk.js --exclude q --im --s d1 > build/temp.js && babel build/temp.js -d build && uglifyjs build/build/temp.js -c > build/diya-sdk.min.js && rm build/temp.js && rm -rf build/build
scripts.build-min-old: browserify src/diya-sdk.js --exclude q --im --s d1 | uglifyjs -c > build/diya-sdk.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
